title: Why do Tristana have so many legacy skins T-T
body: Tristana have lots of amazing looking skins but most of them are legacy skins T-T. I really really want the Earnest elf tristana skin and the Firefighter tristana skin ... but they are both legacy skins and now the Guerilla skin will become legacy skin soon if im right, Rito why you do this.

replies.body: Good thing i just got geurilla trist in a mystery gift :P

Earnest elf is always released during Snowdown and not long ago there were a few bundles that included Firefighter Tristana, including her own bundle when she got that rework back then.
It still bothers me just for the simple fact that they're making skins for champions that don't need them, e.g Teemo, Yi's new Project Skin and the skin Annie got for Valentines, also Kats Warring Kingdoms skin (as awesome as they all are, why rito?) etc etc.

What i don't understand is this: why make one of victor's skins legacy when he only has 3 (now 2) and give Yi, veigar, teemo, ezreal etc more skins when they already have the most in the game.

Moral of the story:
steal from the poor and give to the rich.
coz she old af, same with pretty much all the champs that were released at the start of the game
And it's funny cause most of them have the arguably better skins, even though the skins department should really be getting better at this by now.
